resources.string: WeatherXM would like to know your location while using the app. This information will be used to provide more accurate information to you.
Go to the app settings to give the required permissions.
Login with your email and your password to access your account.
Claim your WXM device by clicking the + button.
Oh, no! No WXM devices yet?
All displayed times are in %s timezone.

A new update of this app has been released. Please click the button below to go to Play Store and update the app.

After updating please restart the app.
If your e-mail is registered with us you will receive instructions for resetting your password.
Enter the email associated with your WeatherXM account and we will send you a password reset link.
Connecting a wallet is mandatory for getting rewards. If you do not connect your wallet, the rewards of your WXM Devices will be lost.
It is highly recommended to use MetaMask, as the most compatible wallet.
Enter or scan WXM wallet address
You don\'t have a WXM wallet?\n Read here how you can create one.
I acknowledge that I have ownership and full access to this wallet.
I acknowledge that this location is the one I will deploy the device.
I have read and accept the Terms of Service.
Signup with your email and your account will be created shortly.
Thanks for joining WeatherXM! We have sent you an account activation link to %s. Please, set a password and then try to sign in.
Not receiving an activation email? Contact our support team.

IMPORTANT: During beta phase, WXM token is deployed on testnet. Rewards will be recalculated and rewarded again after WXM mainnet token launch. Actual rewards may differ from the ones you see in the chart above.
We will need to access bluetooth in order to utilise it in connecting and communicating to your WeatherXM Device.
We will need to access your location in order to utilise it in connecting and communicating to your WeatherXM Device.
To claim your device, you must enable Bluetooth and allow WXM app to access it. \n\nAlternative, you can tap bellow to claim the device manually!
No bluetooth found. Please select Claim Device Manually.
Go to Settings and Grant Access
In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Location. If you do not wish to provide such access, please select Claim Device Manually.
In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs an enabled Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, please select Claim Device Manually.
In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, please select Claim Device Manually.
Please reset your WXM device and scan again!\nOr, you can try claiming your device manually below.
Something went wrong! Please either Scan Again, or if the problem persists, you can Claim Device Manually.

Step 1
Swipe left on your WXM device\'s screen and press \"Configure WiFi\" to connect the device to your home WiFi.
Step 2
Plug the GPS antenna into your WXM device, place the antenna near a window and power up the device via USB.
Step 3
Press NEXT to claim your device.

Don\'t have a WXM device yet? Get one on weatherxm.com.
Trouble claiming your device? Contact our support team.
The S/N is 18 characters long and looks like this: 12:34:56:78:9A:BC:DE:F0:12. You can find it on your M5 device\'s screen. Please type only the letters and numbers.
Please set your location in the map so you can proceed with claiming the device.
Dev EUI and Device Key can be found in the station package. Alternative, you can scan the QR on the packaging.
The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, claim your device manually.
The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable it and try again or claim your device manually.
The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Bluetooth connection has been lost. Please try again, and if the problem persists, claim your device manually.
Oops! No forecast weather data could not be found.
No weather data found for your device for this day.
No weather data found for your device for %s.
This friendly name is private. It will be visible only to you when you are logged in.
